page.title: 16Sarah's life in Eastoft
page.content: On Saturday I get up at 9am and have breakfast then play tennis in the square with friends. The boys play cricket in people's yards or go on the BMX course opposite my house. Sometimes my family go shopping on a Saturday to Scunthorpe because our one shop only sells sweets,cereals and frozen things. We have a bus stop with a seat in it and a village green with seats on it. The owner cuts the grass every six weeks and there is a telephone box on it.There is also a war memorial. The school is next to the church so the children can practise hymn singing for special occasions. Near the school is a new village hall,-we use it for entertainment like parties and discos for the children and the W.I uses it every other Wednesday.
